title: Advanced Cardiovascular Life Support (ACLS) Maintenance Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic BLS (Basic Life Support) knowledge and intermediate-level medical understanding
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education utilizing high-fidelity manikin simulations on a regular basis; microlearning modules combining theory and practice are delivered via mobile platforms

learning_goals: Learners maintain 75% or higher accuracy in performing ACLS core skills (medication administration, ECG interpretation, compression rate maintenance) after 120 days.
Within 120 days of high-fidelity simulation training, learners achieve superior performance in six or more out of eight ACLS skills compared to untrained teams.
Learners achieve an average score of 3 or higher on a 4-point scale (1â€“4) for team collaboration ability assessments during emergency scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
